bike.description: FACT 8m carbon, 29" geometry, FACT IS construction, tapered HT, carbon PF30 BB, PM 140 rear brake, sliding dropouts

components.description: 1-1/8 threadless, Campy style upper with 1-1/2" lower bearing for tapered integrated HT, cartridge bearings
32.6mm clamp size, 7050 hard anodized alloy collar, single bolt
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
